property.name: userHandle
property.formula: (SELECT u.handle FROM user u where u.user_id = user_id)

property.name: resourceName
property.formula: ( CASE WHEN permission_type_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN ( SELECT p.name FROM tc_direct_project p WHERE p.project_id = resource_id ) WHEN permission_type_id BETWEEN 4 AND 6 AND is_studio = 1 THEN ( SELECT p.name FROM studio_oltp:contest p WHERE p.contest_id = resource_id ) WHEN permission_type_id BETWEEN 4 AND 6 AND is_studio = 0 THEN ( SELECT pi.value FROM tcs_catalog:project p JOIN tcs_catalog:project_info pi ON p.project_id = pi.project_id WHERE p.project_id = resource_id AND pi.project_info_type_id = 6 ) END )
